main_definition: To carry out or execute a task, action, or role in front of an audience.

meanings_and_examples.example: The actor was performing his part flawlessly.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Executing a specific task or job skillfully
meanings_and_examples.example: She is an excellent pianist, always performing complex pieces with ease.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Playing music in public for listeners
meanings_and_examples.example: The street performer was performing his guitar songs to passersby.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Carrying out a religious ritual or ceremony
meanings_and_examples.example: During the festival, many people were performing traditional dances and prayers.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Operating machinery or equipment in a professional setting
meanings_and_examples.example: The technician was performing routine maintenance on the industrial equipment.
